comments: I had dr. sun in Quant and HATED it. Fortunately, he has gotten better(most likely due to all of the negative reviews students give him). He tries his best to relate and be thorough but just doesn\'t get there sometimes. in quant his tests were completely different than work in class. 4200 is more related to classwork
I have been in his Quant lecture before. this is the second time i take his courses. i love to be in his class, simply because i feel my knowledge has increased.

Although this class was a little challenging, if I can make an A, anyone can. His accent does make understanding him a small obstacle in the beginning, but absolutely do-able if you care enough to try. His tests are quite a bit harder than ANY material presented in class, but he does give partial credit.

quant lecture, he teaches straight from the book, takes shortcuts in all of his examples, he explains the easy stuff way too much and the hard stuff way too little and doesn\'t know how to answer questions. accent is very hard to get used to but you do eventually. has a very strange attitude and changes his expectations day to day.

I am smart. and I attended class and I worked my ass off. held the highest grade in the class until the final - it is weighted 40% of the total grade and is insanely hard. Dropped my grade to a B+ even though I was 15 points above the average. Very hard to understand and his test questions are identical to his practice ones.....only 20x harder

No dout he can hardly speak english and acts as though he is always in a hurry to get through the material. If you ask him a question is response is "UH, OK",as if he did not understand stand what you said. He is terrible and has no business teaching. It is a shame we pay for this class. Do not take him!!! Your better of teaching yourself!

Run away. Or just don\'t even bother coming to class, lol. Everything I learned, I taught myself from the book - his lectures are completely useless. There is a MAJOR accent barrier, & he talks too fast anyway. Exams are fair, though - they often come straight from assigned homework problems so if you\'re diligent and teach yourself, you\'ll be fine.

His tests are fairly easy if you put forth the effort and have good study habits. Do not take this professor if you are lazy. You will have to rely on the book a lot because he teaches at a pretty fast pace.
Can barely speak english, doesnt teach very well or much less explain anything. Expects you to somehow know all the material. I thought Dr. Wild was bad but this guy is even worse.
